handoff_data.summary: Completed comprehensive destination analysis for Thailand summer 40 percent off campaign
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use destination analysis, pricing and emotional triggers to maximize campaign impact. Акцентируйте email на скидке 40%, визуалах моря, семейном и молодежном отдыхе.
